description: Employee of the month, Thyle Knoxx, has had it up to here with his boss Kit Cohen's unprofessional behavior in the office. From unwrapping the delivery guy Markus Kage's package in his office to riding a butt plug in the middle of the conference room table -- and jizzing on Thyle's Employee of the Month award -- this nymphomanager's naughtiness knows no bounds. Intern Alex Mecum thinks Thyle's just jealous, and to prove who's the better employee he helps Kit photocopy his junk before pounding his hole over the copier till he cums on Kit's ass, then takes the boss's load on his face!
title: Nymphomanager
